blocks.content: Dissertation Topic: Development of Technological Foundations for Oxidative Blowing in a Ladle during the Production of Low-Carbon Steel
Order No. 16 dated 03.02.2025 'On the Establishment of a One-time Specialized Academic Council for Awarding the Degree of Doctor of Philosophy'

Chairman of the One-time Council – Chernyatevych Anatolii Hryhorovych, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Professor, Chief Researcher of the Department of Physical and Technical Problems of Steel Metallurgy of the Z.I. Nekrasov Institute of Ferrous Metallurgy of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine.

Official Opponent – Zhadanos Oleksandr Volodymyrovych, Candidate of Technical Sciences, Associate Professor, Associate Professor of the Department of Electrometallurgy named after Academician M.I. Gasik of the Dnipro Metallurgical Institute of the Ukrainian State University of Science and Technology of the Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine.

Official Opponent — Smirnov Oleksii Mykolaiovych, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Professor, Head of the Department of Magnetic Hydrodynamics of the Physical and Technological Institute of Metals and Alloys.

Reviewer – Kysliakov Volodymyr Hennadiiovych, Candidate of Technical Sciences, Head of the Department of External Cast Iron Treatment of the Z.I. Nekrasov Institute of Ferrous Metallurgy of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine.

Reviewer – Piptiuk Vitalii Petrovych, Candidate of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher, Senior Researcher of the Department of Physical and Technical Problems of Steel Metallurgy of the Z.I. Nekrasov Institute of Ferrous Metallurgy of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine.
Date and Time of Defense: April 1, 2025, starting at 10:00.
Place of Defense: Dnipro, Academician Starodubov Square, 1, Room 116.
